We’re DC dads that still love shows.

Featured: Death from Above 1979 visits DC on 12/1/14.

Already a member? Check the upcoming events.

Are you a dad? Do you still love to go to shows, like at 930 Club or Blackcat? We’re {num} dads strong and growing.

If you answered yes, then this is your group; we organize 1 event a month where it’s just us dads, and 1 event where it’s us dads & our kiddos. I took my daughter to see !!! (chk chk chk) at Snallygaster this year, and she loved it; and I want to keep on rockin’!

Please enter a valid email address.
We use MailChimp to send announcements and updates, but you can unsubscribe (i.e. leave the group) at any time.
